title: Opinion: Why Space Exploration Should Be a National Priority Again
introText: The Apollo era inspired a generation and produced technological spinoffs still benefiting society today. As China races ahead in space, America must recommit to ambitious exploration that inspires citizens and advances science.

content.content: Space exploration drives technological innovation, inspires STEM education, and addresses fundamental questions about humanity's place in the universe. These benefits far exceed the modest investment required.
China is building a space station, planning lunar bases, and developing capabilities that could threaten American space assets. Leadership in space is increasingly a national security imperative.
